text: Charlie Semine (born October 28) is an American actor, known for BrainDead, Mercy and The Following. ==Life and career== Born in Marblehead, Massachusetts to Christian and Deborah, Semine is a graduate of Marblehead High School, Tufts University and Yale School of Drama. He lives in New York City with his wife Roxanna Hope Raja. In 2017 he performed in the Broadway premiere of Junk by Ayad Akhtar at Lincoln Center Theater. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Film, television and video game |- ! Year ! Title !
